mapper.select: select nation || ' ('|| count(nation) ||')' as nation_count from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) group by nation order by count(nation)

select db_name || ' ('|| count(db_name) ||')' as db_name_count from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and nation=#{nation} group by db_name order by count(db_name) desc

select sector || ' ('|| count(sector) ||')' as sector_count from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and db_name=#{db_name} group by sector order by count(sector) desc
select name, stock_code from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and sector=#{sector} order by name desc
SELECT STOCK_CODE FROM AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and name = #{name}
SELECT name FROM addition where id=#{id} WHERE nation=#{nation} AND db_name=#{db_name} AND sector=#{sector} AND name=#{name} AND stock_code=#{stock_code}
SELECT * FROM AvailableData A INNER JOIN addition ON A.stock_code = addition.stock_code WHERE addition.id = #{id}
select name, stock_code, db_name from availabledata where name like '%' || '${stock_code_or_name}' || '%' or stock_code like '%' || '${stock_code_or_name}' || '%'
SELECT name FROM AvailableData where stock_code = #{stock_code}
